scalar_parameters.name: is_kinetic
scalar_parameters.description: Use kinetic binding (true) or rapid equilibrium (false)

component_parameters.name: adsorption_rate
component_parameters.description: Adsorption rate constant (only used if is_kinetic=true)

component_parameters.name: desorption_rate
component_parameters.description: Desorption rate constant (only used if is_kinetic=true)
